recipe.title: Collard Green and Radish Slaw with Crispy Shallots
ingredients: 1 bunch collard greens (about 10 ounces), center ribs and stems removed, thinly sliced crosswise
instructions: Cook shallots and oil in a small saucepan over medium-high heat, stirring occasionally, until shallots are golden, 8–10 minutes. Using a slotted spoon, transfer shallots to a paper towel–lined plate; season with salt. Transfer oil to a small bowl and let cool. Combine collard greens, radishes, and vinegar in a large bowl; season with salt and pepper. Drizzle with shallot oil and toss to coat. Top with crispy shallots. DO AHEAD: Crispy shallots can be made 2 hours ahead. Store shallots and oil separately at room temperature.
